title: Filippovka Burial Ground
description: An archaeological site with nine burial mounds, including an intact royal mound (kurgan), located in the Southern Ural Region of Russia dating from the 6th-4th centuries BCE.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of the Filippovka Burial Ground site derived from an OpenStreetMap Node, following Yablonsky 2010.
properties.title: OSM location of Filippovka Burial Ground
